item.title: 克罗地亚的武伊奇奇获提名出任欧洲央行下一任副行长
item.description: 据知情人士透露，克罗地亚央行行长博里斯·武伊奇奇已获得欧元区财长提名，将出任下一任欧洲央行副行长。【原文：Croatia’s central-bank chief, Boris Vujcic, won the nomination of euro-area finance ministers to become the next European Central Bank vice president, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易威胁为达沃斯对决铺垫舞台
item.description: 由于美国总统将出席，本届世界经济论坛可能是近年来最具影响力的会议之一。【原文：With the US president due to attend, the World Economic Forum may be one of the most consequential in years.】

item.title: 欧洲央行二号职位竞选剩余四名候选人，两名波罗的海国家候选人退出
item.description: 知情人士透露，随着两个波罗的海国家退出角逐，欧元区财长们已将欧洲央行副行长候选人范围缩小至四人。【原文：Euro-area finance ministers narrowed the field for the European Central Bank vice presidency to four candidates as two Baltic nations withdrew from the race, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 洪表示，道富银行正计划进一步拓展二级市场业务
item.description: 道富集团旗下资产管理业务部门正寻求更多机会，为散户投资者提供参与二级市场交易及其他私募资产的渠道。【原文：State Street Corp.’s asset management arm is seeking more opportunities to give retail investors access to secondaries and other private assets.】

item.title: 智利新任总统接手危机：肆虐山火已致19人死亡
item.description: 智利当选总统何塞·安东尼奥·卡斯特将面临危机，上周末肆虐的山火已造成至少19人死亡，数百人无家可归，这将为其政府任期内开启漫长的重建进程。【原文：Chilean President-elect José Antonio Kast will inherit a crisis as raging wildfires killed at least 19 people over the weekend and left hundreds homeless, setting up a lengthy reconstruction process on his administration’s watch.】

item.title: 将10万亿美元美国资产"武器化"对欧洲而言是项艰巨任务
item.description: 当欧洲正考虑如何最好地回应美国总统唐纳德·特朗普关于格陵兰主权的最新威胁时，一项极端的潜在反制措施正在投资者中引发激烈讨论。【原文：As Europe considers how best to respond to US President Donald Trump’s latest threats over Greenland’s sovereignty, there’s one extreme potential counter measure that’s fueling debate among investors.】

item.title: 阿联酋将与印度贸易额翻倍，签署长期液化天然气合同
item.description: 在国际地缘政治局势动荡之际，阿联酋与印度正寻求深化双边关系。阿联酋将投资开发印度西部一个特殊投资中心，并计划到2032年将双边贸易额提升至2000亿美元。【原文：The United Arab Emirates will invest in developing a special investment hub in western India as well as double bilateral trade to $200 billion by 2032 as the two countries seek closer ties amid global geopolitical uncertainties.】

item.title: 英国监管机构称Meta放任非法赌博网站广告
item.description: 英国赌博委员会指出，Meta Platforms公司对在Facebook和Instagram上投放广告的非法赌博网站视而不见。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is turning a blind eye to illegal gambling sites that advertise on Facebook and Instagram, according to the UK’s Gambling Commission.】

item.title: 贸易不确定性削弱乐观情绪，加拿大央行调查显示
item.description: 加拿大银行的调查显示，随着持续的美国贸易战加剧不确定性，企业和消费者持续保持悲观情绪。【原文：Bank of Canada surveys show persistent pessimism among firms and consumers as the ongoing US trade war deepens uncertainty.】

item.title: 据称CSG计划周五上市，估值达250亿欧元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，国防企业捷克斯洛伐克集团正考虑通过加速首次公开募股（IPO）设定发行价，公司估值将达到约250亿欧元（291亿美元）。【原文：Defense firm Czechoslovak Group AS is considering setting a price in an accelerated initial public offering that would value the company at about €25 billion ($29.1 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大股市因通胀报告及关税担忧下跌
item.description: 加拿大股市周一开盘走低，此前公布的通胀报告超出预期，且该国正考虑向格陵兰岛派兵，尽管美国总统特朗普威胁将加征更多关税。【原文：Canadian equities slipped at Monday’s open after a hotter-than-expected inflation report and as the country considers sending troops to Greenland despite threats of more tariffs from US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织总裁乔治耶娃称，格陵兰岛争端可能抑制经济增长
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔利娜·格奥尔基耶娃表示，目前评估格陵兰岛争端对经济的影响为时尚早，但这可能成为经济增长的阻力。【原文：International Monetary Fund Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva said it’s too early to gauge the economic impact of tensions over Greenland, though it could be a headwind for growth.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片初创公司FuriosaAI计划在IPO前完成5亿美元融资
item.description: 知情人士透露，人工智能芯片设计公司FuriosaAI正计划在首次公开募股前进行一轮融资，目标筹集资金高达5亿美元，以备战挑战行业巨头英伟达公司。【原文：Artificial intelligence chip designer FuriosaAI is seeking to raise as much as $500 million in a funding round before an initial public offering as it gears up to challenge industry titan Nvidia Corp., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 中国首席贸易谈判代表将赴达沃斯会见全球企业高管
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国国务院副总理贺立峰——国家经济事务主管兼首席贸易谈判代表——将在出席世界经济论坛期间会见一批全球企业首席执行官。【原文：Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng, the nation’s economic czar and top trade negotiator, is scheduled to meet with a group of global CEOs while attending the World Economic Forum, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴里克更换首席财务官，重组持续推进，或将启动首次公开募股
item.description: 巴里克黄金公司任命蔡海伦为首席财务官，接替格雷厄姆·舒特沃斯。舒特沃斯的离职加剧了这家加拿大矿业公司高管离职潮，市场正猜测该公司可能面临被收购或拆分命运。【原文：Barrick Mining Corp. appointed Helen Cai as chief financial officer, replacing Graham Shuttleworth whose departure adds to a string of senior exits at the Canadian miner amid speculation it could be acquired or broken up.】

item.title: BCE首席执行官称数据中心部署进度快于预期
item.description: 加拿大对数据中心容量的需求正促使贝尔加拿大公司加速推进其新的人工智能业务，该公司首席执行官表示，新设施的建设进度已超前于计划。【原文：Demand for data center capacity in Canada is causing BCE Inc. to accelerate work on its new artificial intelligence business, and the construction of new facilities is ahead of schedule, its top executive said.】

item.title: 金矿商谋划扣押秘鲁资产以抵偿逾6700万美元仲裁债务
item.description: 一家加拿大黄金矿商表示，除非秘鲁政府立即支付仲裁裁决款项，否则将试图扣押该国国家资产——包括未来债务偿付。【原文：A Canadian gold miner said it will attempt to seize Peruvian state assets — including future debt payments — unless the South American nation makes prompt payment of an arbitration award.】

item.title: 奢侈品股跌至三个月低点，分析师警告估值过高
item.description: 随着欧洲奢侈品股在2026年开局表现疲软，部分分析师警告称该行业近期涨势已导致估值显得虚高。【原文：As Europe’s luxury-goods stocks get off to a shaky start to 2026, some analysts are warning that the sector’s recent rally has left valuations looking inflated.】

item.title: 俄罗斯大幅削减2025年底支出以实现预算缺口目标
item.description: 俄罗斯在12月收紧了财政支出，政府采取措施将财政缺口控制在其最新修订的目标范围内，此举是在石油收入大幅下滑的背景下实施的。【原文：Russia reined in spending in December as the government moved to keep the fiscal gap within its most recently revised target amid a slump in oil revenue.】

item.title: 挪威主权财富基金减持英国资产，维持整体投资敞口
item.description: 挪威2万亿美元主权财富基金正出售部分英国公司股份，以配合其战略目标减少个别持股数量。【原文：Norway’s $2 trillion sovereign wealth fund is selling off shares in some UK companies as it works to reduce the number of individual holdings in line with its strategy.】

item.title: 戴比尔斯时隔一年多首次下调钻石价格
item.description: 知情人士透露，戴比尔斯公司下调了官方钻石价格，这是该公司一年多来首次降价，标志着其在需求疲软面前支撑市场的努力宣告终结。【原文：De Beers cut its official diamond prices for the first time in more than a year, according to people familiar with the matter, ending its attempts to support the market in the face of slumping demand.】

item.title: 杨立昆的AMI实验室吸引国泰、广达投资人关注
item.description: 知情人士透露，亚恩·勒库恩（Yann LeCun）的人工智能初创公司AMI Labs已吸引包括国泰创新（Cathay Innovation）在内的潜在投资者参与融资，此轮融资可能使这位前Meta Platforms Inc.研究员的企业估值达到30亿欧元（约合35亿美元）。【原文：Yann LeCun’s artificial intelligence startup, AMI Labs, has attracted potential backers including Cathay Innovation in a round that could value the former Meta Platforms Inc. researcher’s business at €3 billion ($3.5 billion), people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 印度需要“八到十家”大型银行，Axis银行首席执行官表示
item.description: 印度轴心银行首席执行官阿米塔布·乔杜里表示，随着银行业整合步伐加快，印度至少需要八到十家大型银行来支撑经济增长。【原文：India will need “at least eight to 10” large banks to support economic growth as consolidation gathers pace across the sector, Axis Bank Chief Executive Officer Amitabh Chaudhry said.】

item.title: 加拿大通胀率因减税政策影响升至2.4%
item.description: 加拿大通胀加速幅度超出预期，因2024年末联邦税收减免政策推高了年度价格同比涨幅，抵消了汽油价格下跌的影响。【原文：Inflation accelerated in Canada by more than expected as a federal tax holiday at the end of 2024 pushed yearly price comparisons higher, offsetting falling gasoline costs.】

item.title: 苏黎世保险集团以77亿英镑收购英国网络保险公司Beazley
item.description: 苏黎世保险集团已提出收购Beazley Plc的要约，对这家在英国上市的网络保险公司估值约为76.7亿英镑（103亿美元）。【原文：Zurich Insurance Group AG has made an offer to buy Beazley Plc, valuing the UK-listed cyber insurer at about £7.67 billion ($10.3 billion).】

item.title: 罗马尼亚维持利率不变，因通胀逼近10%阻碍宽松政策讨论
item.description: 罗马尼亚央行维持着欧盟最高利率之一，政策制定者正等待通胀率从约10%回落，之后才会开始讨论降低借贷成本的问题。【原文：Romania’s central bank maintained one of the highest interest rates in the European Union as policymakers wait for inflation to slow from around 10% before they start discussions about lowering borrowing costs.】

item.title: 对冲基金Picton警告：若美联储向特朗普低头，市场必将予以惩罚
item.description: 皮克顿投资公司负责人表示，若特朗普总统任命一位被视为过于随和的美联储主席，债券市场将迅速对美国施加惩罚——而贵金属仍是抵御政治动荡的优质对冲工具。【原文：The head of Picton Investments said bond markets will swiftly discipline the US if President Donald Trump appoints a Federal Reserve chair who’s seen as too malleable — and precious metals remain a good hedge against political volatility.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所打造24/7代币化股票与ETF交易平台
item.description: 纽约证券交易所正利用区块链技术打造一个交易平台，实现代币化股票和交易所交易基金全天候交易。【原文：The New York Stock Exchange is building a venue using blockchain technology to allow for trading tokenized stocks and exchange-traded funds around the clock.】

item.title: 塞内加尔庆祝足球胜利之际，债务谈判仍在进行
item.description: 塞内加尔总统巴希鲁·迪奥梅·法耶宣布，因国家足球队周日赢得非洲国家杯冠军，全国放假一天。此举为正深陷债务危机的国家注入了强心剂。【原文：Senegalese President Bassirou Diomaye Faye declared a public holiday following the national football team’s victory at the Africa Cup of Nations championship Sunday, providing a morale boost to a country grappling with a debt crisis.】

item.title: Revolut申请秘鲁银行牌照以拓展拉丁美洲业务
item.description: Revolut Ltd.在秘鲁申请了全牌照银行执照，随着其在拉丁美洲的扩张，该公司正与该地区一些最大的金融科技公司展开竞争。【原文：Revolut Ltd. applied for a full banking license in Peru as it expands in Latin America to compete with some of the region’s biggest financial-technology firms.】
